Show solution
ggplot(gapminder, aes(year, lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Life expectancy")


`geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'
